name: StarShooting Alliance
description:
This game was made under the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

The theme was "You're not alone", I thought about fighting stronger enemies with allies because, sometimes in life, we aren't stronger enough to overcome a problem on our own but together we can be successful.

The game takes place in space where you have to defeat incoming enemies who are getting stronger and stronger. After defeating an enemy, you are rewarded with Coins which can be used to summon allies. Allies gives you bonus stats, passive abilities and active abilities (which are called "Gifts").

Keys:

  • WASD : to move
  • Mouse Left Button : Shoot Projectiles
  • You can aim with the mouse
  • Numbers key from 1 to 5 to cast active abilities (only if you have allies activated)

Unfortunately, I ran out of time, maybe because I aimed too high for a week-long project, I would have liked to add more levels, enemies, abilities indicator, more allies and of course allies' descriptions.

Keep me in touch if you want me to expand this project.

Big shoutout to @finalbossblues and @HumblePixelShop for their awesome work.

Feel free to follow me on Twitter: @Padrox_dev
